org.digijava.module.translation.entity

Class MessageGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.translation.entity.MessageGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatcherMessageGroup

    public class MessageGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Group of messages with same translation key. They also should have same hash key but generated preferably from English translation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageGroup(Message message)
      Constructs group using first message which will be added in this group.
      MessageGroup(java.lang.String key) 
      MessageGroup(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String prefix)
      Constructs group for particular key.
      MessageGroup(Trn trn)
      Creates message group from XML trn tag.
      MessageGroup(Trn trn, java.lang.Long currentSiteId)
      Creates message group from XML trn tag for specified site.

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(Message message)
        Adds message to the group. If one tries to add message with different key then exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • doPutMessage

        protected void doPutMessage(Message message)
        puts message in group. This protected method does not check if keys are same. This is required for hash code grouping
        Parameters:
        message -
